meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>delight</kanji> and <kanji>comfort</kanji> <kanji>street</kanji>. Sounds nice. Sounds like the "<vocabulary>pleasure quarter</vocabulary>." You'll see these most often in samurai films, or in sketchier areas.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
